text: Leonard Shaun Goater MBE (born 25 February 1970) is a Bermudian former professional footballer, coach and pundit who currently works as Interim Manager for Aston Villa W.F.C. ==Club career statistics== |- |1989–90||Manchester United||First Division||0||0 |- |1989–90||rowspan="5"|Rotherham United||rowspan="2"|Third Division||12||2 |- |1990–91||22||2 |- |1991–92||Fourth Division||24||9 |- |1992–93||rowspan="2"|Second Division||23||7 |- |1993–94||39||13 |- |1993–94||Notts County||First Division||1||0 |- |1994–95||rowspan="2"|Rotherham United||rowspan="2"|Second Division||45||19 |- |1995–96||44||18 |- |1996–97||rowspan="2"|Bristol City||rowspan="2"|Second Division||42||23 |- |1997–98||33||17 |- |1997–98||rowspan="6"|Manchester City||First Division||7||3 |- |1998–99||Second Division||43||17 |- |1999–00||First Division||40||23 |- |2000–01||Premier League||26||6 |- |2001–02||First Division||42||28 |- |2002–03||Premier League||26||7 |- |2003–04||rowspan="2"|Reading||First Division||34||12 |- |2004–05||League Championship||9||0 |- |2004–05||Coventry City||League Championship||6||0 |- |2005–06||Southend United||League One||33||11 |- |2007||rowspan="2"|Bermuda Hogges||rowspan="2"|USL Second Division||8||3 |- |2008|||| 551||217 8||3 558||220 |} ==International career statistics== |- !Total||36||32 |} ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Bermudian footballers Category:British footballers Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players
